main.name: Jake Polacek
main.description: I'm interested in how cybersecurity, defense, and privacy - as well as law and policy regarding technology, computers, and the Internet - can be used to improve the tech sector. I'm always willing to learn more about security, so PLEASE send me recommendations!
main.bio: My interests vary more than the variable foo. Some of these intersts include hockey, vexillology, travelling, world history, and geography.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to reach out to me by filling out the following form:

work.title: Software Engineering Intern - Electronic Warfare
work.description: Implemented optimization of interfaces to reach compatability with .NET Framework Developed scripts to automate compiling, packaging, testing, deployment, and documentation using Python, MSBuild, and Batch

work.title: Subteam Lead
work.description: Lead a team to design and build the electrical system for a Hyperloop pod for the SpaceX Hyperloop Competition • Develop software and configure hardware to autonomously control the pod in response to position, speed, and orientation, with support for manual override

projects.title: Humans: A Brief History of How We F*cked Up
projects.category: Modern humans have come a long way in the seventy thousand years they’ve walked the earth. Art, science, culture, trade—on the evolutionary food chain, we’re true winners. But it hasn’t always been smooth sailing, and sometimes—just occasionally—we’ve managed to truly f*ck things up.

projects.title: The Code Book: The Science of Secrecy from Ancient Egypt to Quantum Cryptography
projects.category: Simon Singh offers the first sweeping history of encryption, tracing its evolution and revealing the dramatic effects codes have had on wars, nations, and individual lives. The Code Book tells the story of the most powerful intellectual weapon ever: secrecy.

projects.title: The Future of Humanity
projects.category: The #1 bestselling author of The Future of the Mind traverses the frontiers of astrophysics, artificial intelligence, and technology to offer a stunning vision of man's future in space, from settling Mars to traveling to distant galaxies.

projects.title: Supermarket
projects.category: “Bobby Hall has crafted a mind-bending first novel, with prose that is just as fierce and moving as his lyrics. Supermarket is like Naked Lunch meets One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest—if they met at Fight Club.”—Ernest Cline
